quizzes.title: Flutter Basics
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge of Flutter fundamentals

questions.question: What is Flutter?
questions.explanation: Flutter is Google's UI toolkit for building natively compiled applications.

questions.question: What programming language is used in Flutter?
questions.explanation: Dart is the programming language used for Flutter development.

questions.question: What is Dart?
questions.explanation: Dart is a programming language developed by Google.

quizzes.title: Firebase Basics
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge of Firebase services

questions.question: Which of the following is a Firebase service?
questions.explanation: Firestore is a NoSQL cloud database provided by Firebase.

questions.question: What type of database does Firebase Firestore use?
questions.explanation: Firestore is a NoSQL cloud database designed for flexible and scalable data storage.

quizzes.title: State Management
quizzes.description: Evaluate your understanding of Flutter state management

questions.question: Which state management approach is built into Flutter?
questions.explanation: Flutter's setState is the built-in way to manage state in a widget.

questions.question: Which package provides state management using streams?
questions.explanation: The Bloc package provides state management based on streams and reactive programming.

quizzes.title: UI/UX Design Principles
quizzes.description: Assess your knowledge of UI/UX design principles

questions.question: What does UX stand for?
questions.explanation: UX stands for User Experience, which focuses on usability and interaction design.

questions.question: Which of the following is an important principle of UI design?
questions.explanation: Consistency is crucial in UI design to ensure a seamless user experience across the application.
